title: Landscape
marks:
Signature, Inscription, Seal, and Label

URQ R center
description: elderly man with long white beard peers out of an opening in a rock formation; another older figure looks at the man in profile; two children at LL of opening crouch together, peering outside; at bottom center, a figure leans against a broom in front of a donkey; tall, twisted tree extends upward at L; inscription near R edge URQ
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr and Mrs Sherman Lee
